Day as division of time:

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[דֶּרֶךְ]] [[יוֹם]] a day's journey Nu 11:31, Nu 11:31( JE), 1Ki 19:4; [[מַהֲלַךְ]] [[יוֹם אֶחָד]] Jon 3:4; [[דֶּרֶךְ שְׁלשֶׁת יׇמִים]] a three days' journey Ge 30:36, Ex 3:18, Ex 5:3, Ex 8:23 (all J), Nu 10:33, Nu 10:33 (JE), Nu 33:8 (P); [[מַהֲלַךְ שְׁלשֶׁת יׇמִים]] Jon 3:3; so seven days' journey Ge 31:23 (E), 2Ki 3:9; without [[דֶּרֶךְ]] etc., [[שְׁלשֶׁת יׇמִים]] Ex 15:22 (E) they went three days, etc.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: to denote duration of various other acts or states: seven days Ge 7:4, Ge 7:10, Ge 8:10, Ge 8:12; forty days Ge 7:17, Ge 8:6 (all J); 150 days Ge 7:24, Ge 8:3 (both P), 1Sa 25:38, 1Ki 8:65, 1Ki 8:65, Je 42:7, Ez Eze 4:5, Eze 4:6, 1Ch 9:25, Ezr 6:22, Es 1:4 etc. In Es 4:16
are combined: [[וְאַל־תִּשְׁתּוּ שְׁלשֶׁת יׇמִים לַיְלָה וׇיוֹם]] do not eat and do not drink for thee days, night or day (v. Zec 14:7 sub
infr.)

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: day as defined by evening and morning Ge 1:5, Ge 1:8, Ge 1:13, Ge 1:19, Ge 1:23, Ge 1:31 (all P; cf. further [[בּׂקֶר]], [[עֶרֶב]]); v. also Ge 2:2, Ge 2:2, Ge 2:3 (P), Ex 20:11, Ex 20:11(E), Ex 32:17, Ex 32:17 (P).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: day of month (c. num. ordin.), chiefly P and late: Ge 7:11, Ge 8:4, Ge 8:14, Ex 12:6, Ex 12:18, Ex 12:18 +, 1Ki 12:32, 1Ki 12:33, Ez Eze 45:21, Eze 45:25, Zec 1:7, Hag 1:1, Hag 1:15, Hag 1:18, 2Ch 29:17, 2Ch 29:17, Ezr 3:6, Ne 8:2, Ne 9:1, Da 10:4, Es 3:12, Es 9:1 + ; ([[יוֹם]] oft. om. e.g. Ge 8:5, Ge 8:13, Ex 12:10, 2Ki 25:1, 2Ki 25:3, Ez Eze 1:1, Eze 1:2, Hag 2:1, Hag 2:20, Zec 7:1, 2Ch 3:2, Ezr 6:19, Es 3:13, etc.)

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: particular days defined by n.pr.loc.: [[יוֹם יִזְרְעֶאל]] Ho 2:2 i.e. of judgement, with implied restoration; v. also Is 9:3, Ez Eze 30:9; [[יְמֵי הַגִּבְעָה]] Ho 9:9, Ho 10:9, i.e. of the outrage at Gibeah (Ju Jdg 19:22 ff.); [[יוֹם ירושׁלם]] Ps 137:7 i.e. of Jerusalem's calamity, cf. Je 50:27, Je 50:31.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: c. sf., thy, his, or their day, in sense of (1) day of disaster or death: Psalm [[בָּא יוֹמְְ]] Je 50:31 thy day has come; [[אוֹ יומו יׇבאׁ וׇמֵת]] 1Sa 26:10; [[יומו]] in this sense also Ez Eze 21:30, Ps 37:13, Job 18:20; † [[בָּא]] [[יוֹמָם]] Je 50:27, Ez Eze 21:29.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: specif. a holy day: [[יוֹם]] [[הַשַּׁבָּת]] the sabbath day (v. also [[שַׁבָּת]]), Ex 20:8, Ex 20:11(E) = De 5:12, De 5:15, Ex 31:15, Ex 35:3 +; = [[יוֹם קָדְשִׁי]] Is 58:13; repetition [[בְּיוֹם הַשַּׁבָּת בְּיוֹם הַשַּׁבָּת]] Le 24:8 every Sabbath day; also † [[יוֹם הַכִּפֻּרים]] Le 23:27, Le 25:9; [[יוֹם כִּפֻּרִים]] Le 23:28; [[יוֹם הַבִּכּוּרִים]] Nu 28:26; [[יוֹם חַגֵּנוּ]] Ps 81:4; [[יוֹם מַלְכֵּנוּ]] Ho 7:5; also of false gods, [[יִמֵי]] [[הַבְּעָלִים]] Ho 2:11.

definitions.title: 7 g
definitions.body: infr.
Pl. days of any one:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: = his life, his age Ge 6:3 (J), De 22:19, De 22:29, De 23:7, Jos 24:31, Jos 24:31 (D), Ju Jdg 2:7, Jdg 2:7, Jdg 2:18, 1Sa 25:28, etc.; Ge 5:4, Ge 5:8, Ge 5:11, Ge 9:29, Ge 11:32 (all P), Job 7:1, Job 7:1, Job 7:6, Job 7:16, Job 8:9, Ps 39:5, Ps 39:5, Ps 90:9, Ps 90:10, Ps 90:12, Ps 90:14, Ps 103:15; [[כָּל־יְמֵי חַיֶּיְ]] Ge 3:14, Ge 3:17 (J), Ps 23:6, so Pr 31:12; [[יְמֵי שְׁנֵי חַיִּים]] 2Sa 19:35, Ge 25:7, Ge 47:8, Ge 47:9 (all P); [[יְמֵי חַיׇּיו]] Ec 5:17, Ec 5:19; [[יְמֵי שָׁנׇיו]] Ec 6:3; [[יְמֵי שְׁנוֹתֵינוּ]] Ps 90:10; [[מִסְפַּר יְמֵי חַיֵּיהֶם]] Ec 2:3; [[מִסְפַּר]] [[יְמֵי חַיֵּי הֶבְלוֹ]] Ec 6:12 the number of the days of the years of his vanity, i.e. his empty, fleeting years; [[כָּל־הַּיׇּמִים אֲשֶׁר־הֵם חַיִּים עַל־פְּנֵי הָאֲדָמָה]] 1Ki 8:40; [[יׇמִים רַבִּים]] long life 1Ki 3:11= 2Ch 1:11; [[בָּא בַּיׇּמִים]] advanced in days = of advanced age Ge 18:11, Ge 24:1 (both J), Jos 13:1, Jos 13:1 (JE), Jos 23:1, Jos 23:2 (D), 1Ki 1:1; [[מִיׇּמָיו]] 1Ki 1:6 from his (earliest) days, so [[מִיׇּמֶיְ]] 1Sa 25:28 (v. Dr), Job 38:12; [[שְׂבַע יׇמִים]] Job 42:17, 1Ki 8:40; [[יַאֲרִכוּן יׇמֶיְ]] Ex 20:12 (JE) that thy days may be long = De 5:16, v. further [[ארך]]; [[יׇמִים עַל־יְמֵי־מֶלֶךְ]] [[תּוֹסִיף]] Ps 61:7 i.e. prolong the king's life; outlive is [[הֶאֱרִיךְ יׇמִים אַחֲרֵי]] Jos 24:31(D), Ju Jdg 2:7; [[אׂרֶךְ יׇמִים]] [[וּשְׁנוֹת חַיִּים]] Pr 3:2 length of days and years of life; [[אׂרֶךְ יׇמִים]] v:Pr 3:16; [[כְּיׇמֶי ְדבאך]] De 33:25 according to (the length of) thy life shall be [ thy strength ? rd. [[רבאך]] ?] v. Di VB ; rarely sg. e.g. [[קְשֵׁה־ יוֹם]] Job 30:25 one hurd of day, i.e. whose day (= life) was hard; of life as approaching its end, [[וַיִּקְרְבוּ יְמֵי ישׂראל לָמוּת]] Ge 47:29 (J) and the days of Israel drew near for dying, so De 31:14, 1Ki 2:l (cf. Job 7:6, Job 7:16, Job 8:9, Ec 2:3 supr.)

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: (in) the days of  (i.e. life-time, reign, or activity of) Ge 10:25 (J), Ge 14:1, Ju Jdg 5:6, Jdg 5:6, Jdg 8:28, 2Sa 21:1, 1Ki 16:34, 1Ki 21:29, 1Ki 21:29, 1Ki 22:47, 2Ki 20:19, 2Ch 13:20, 2Ch 35:18 + oft. (so MI:6.8.8.9.33).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: hence in phr. [[סֵפֶר דִּבְרֵי הַיׇּמִים לְ]] 1Ki 14:19, 1Ki 14:29 + 31 t. K, Ne 12:23, Es 2:23, Es 10:2; [[מִסְפַּרת דִּבְרֵי הַיׇּמִים]] 1Ch 27:24; [[סֵפֶר הַזִּכְרׂנוֹת דִּבְרֵי הַיׇּמִים]] Es 6:1.
Days:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: indef.: [[יׇמִים אֲחָדִים]] some days, a few days † Ge 27:44 (J), Ge 29:10 (E), Da 11:20; [[יׇמִים]] alone Ge 40:4 (E) they were days (a certain time) in the prison 1Ki 17:15, Ne 1:4; [[עוּל יׇמִים]] Is 65:20 a suckling of  (a few) days; [[מִיׇּמִים]] Ju Jdg 11:4 after a time, Jdg 15:1; so [[מִקֵּץ יׇמִים]] Ge 4:3 (J) after the end of days, 1Ki 17:7; [[יוֹם אוֹ יוֹמַיִם]] Ex 21:21(JE) a day or two. [[יׇמִים אוֹ עָשׂוֹר]] Ge 24:55 (J) some days, or ten (days or a dekad; on question of txt. v. Di).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of long time, [[זֶה יׇמִים אוֹ זֶה שָׁנִים]] 1Sa 29:3 these days or these years; [[אוֹ יׁמַיִם אוֹ חׂדֶשׁ אוֹ יׇמִים]] Nu 9:22 (P) whether two days or a month or days (an indefinitely long period); [[יׇמִים רַבִּים]] many days Ge 21:34 (JE) Ge 37:34 (J) +; ´[[וַיִּרְבּוּ הַיׇּמִים וגו]] Ge 38:12 (J) and the days were multiplied (= time passed) and Judah's wife died, 1Sa 7:2; [[אָֽרְכוּ לוֹ שָׁם הַיׇּמִים]] Ge 26:8 (J) the days were long to him there = he had been there a long time; [[יׇמִים רַבִּים]]…[[בְּהַאֲרִיךְ הֶעָנׇן]] Nu 9:19 (P) when the cloud prolonged many days (remained a long time) upon the tabern—Vid. also
infr.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: days of old, former or ancient times (esp. of early period of Isr. hist): [[יְמוֹת]] [[עוֹלָם]] De 32:7 (poem); [[יְמֵי עוֹלם]] Mic 5:1, Mic 7:14, Is 63:9, Is 63:11; [[יְמֵי קֶדֶם]] Mic 7:20; [[יׇמִים מִקֶּדֶם]] Ps 77:6, Ps 143:5; cf. [[הַיׇּמִים]] [[הָרִאשׁׂנִים]] Ec 7:10; coming days [[הַיׇּמִים הַבָּאִים]] Ec 2:16; coming time [[יוֹם אַהֲרוֹן]] Pr 31:25; esp. [[אַחֲרִית]]([[ב]]) [[הַיׇּמִים]] v. p. 31 supr.; [[לְקֵץ הַיׇּמִין]] Da 12:13.
[[יוֹם]] = time;

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: vividly in gen. sense (v. also

supr.): time of harvest Pr 25:13; usu. [[יְמֵי]] Ge 30:14 (J), Jos 3:15, Nu 13:20, Nu 13:20 (all JE), Ju Jdg 15:1, 2Sa 21:9; proper time for paying wages De 24:15 cf. Job 14:6; time of parturition [[וַיִּמְלְאוּ יׇמֶיהָ לָלֶדֶת]] Ge 25:24.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: appos. to other expr. of time (Dr:§ 192 (1) Da:Synt.:#xa7; 29. d): [[חׂדֶשׁ יׇמִים]] a month of time Ge 29:14 (J; lit. a month, time), Nu 11:20, Nu 11:21 (JE); = [[יֶרַח יׇמִים]] De 21:13, 2Ki 15:13; [[יׇמִים ארבעה חדשׁים]] Ju Jdg 19:2 time, four months (si vera l., v. 1Sa 27:7); † [[שְׁנׇתַיִם יׇמִים]] ([[מִקֵּץ]]) Ge 41:1 (E) two years (of) time, 2Sa 13:23, 2Sa 14:28, Je 28:3, Je 28:11; [[שְׁלשָׁה שָׁבֻעִים יׇמִים]] Da 10:2, Da 10:3 three weeks (of) time.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: pl. in specific sense, appar.= year, lit. [[יׇמִים]] 1Sa 27:7, Le 25:29 (H); [[לַיׇּמִים]] Ju Jdg 17:10; [[חֶבַךְ]] [[הַיׇּמִים]] 1Sa 1:21, 1Sa 2:19, 1Sa 20:6; [[יׇמִים וארבעה חדשׁים]] 1Sa 27:7 = a year and four months (cf. Ju Jdg 19:2 supr.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: ); [[מִיׇּמִים יׇמִ֫ימָה]] = from year to year, yearly Ex 13:10 (JE), Ju Jdg 11:40 (cf. v:b), Jdg 21:19, 1Sa 1:3, 1Sa 2:19; [[מִקֵּץ יׇמִים]] [[לַיׇּמִים]] 2Sa 14:26; [[יׁמַיִם אוֹ חׂדֶשׁ אוֹ־יׇמִים]] Nu 9:22 (P); distrib. definitions.title: a.
